articles.content: Ferrari Team Principal Mattia Binotto called on his team to deliver a one-two finish in this weekends Hungarian Grand Prix after Charles Leclerc crashed out and Carlos Sainz finished fifth in France.… [+3240 chars]

articles.title: Davante Adams attempts to clarify comment suggesting Derek Carr is a Hall of Famer - NBC Sports
articles.description: New Raiders wide receiver Davante Adams raised some eyebrows on Friday when he said he was adjusting from playing with one Hall of Fame quarterback in Aaron Rodgers to playing with another Hall of Fame quarterback in Derek Carr. On Sunday, Adams attempted to …

articles.title: Tony Finau shoots 4-under 67 | Round 4 | 3M Open - PGA TOUR
articles.description: In the final round of the 2022 3M Open, Tony Finau shot a 4-under 67 to roar back and win at TPC Twin Cities.SUBSCRIBE to PGA TOUR now: http://pgat.us/vBxcZS...
